summary: Pradeep Kumar P C Senior Technology Lead – Infrastructure & DevOps Highly experienced Senior Technology Lead with over 10 years in Infrastructure and DevOps, specializing in cloud architecture and automation. Proven ability to design, implement, and optimize high-availability (HA) cloud and on- premises infrastructures using AWS, Azure, Docker, and CI/CD pipelines. Expertise includes configuration management (Ansible), database tuning (PostgreSQL, MySQL), and deploying robust infrastructure-as-code solutions for enterprise applications. Cloud Architecture & High Availability (HA): Proven success in designing and implementing HA setups on AWS using Elastic Load Balancers, auto-scaling, and Nginx reverse proxy, ensuring system failover and redundancy. DevOps & Automation: Extensive hands-on experience in automating environment provisioning and deployment workflows using CI/CD pipelines and Ansible playbooks. Database Optimization: Strong background in guiding developers on PostgreSQL and MySQL performance tuning, including indexing, configuration optimization, and replication strategies. Linux System Administration: Over a decade of experience in Linux servers (Red Hat / Ubuntu / CentOS), managing security hardening, monitoring, and patch management for production systems.
